item.description: TOP NEWS: * SAP - Bei Europas größtem Softwarekonzern hat sich das Wachstum der wichtigen Cloud-Sparte im abgelaufenen Quartal erneut abgeschwächt. item.title: DWS Raises Mid-Term Profit Target, Plans Special Dividend
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- DWS Group raised its mid-term profit target and said it will pay a special dividend after Deutsche Bank AG’s investments arm managed to keep a lid on costs and refrained from large acquisitions. Germany’s largest asset manager now seeks to increase earnings per share annually by 10% ...

item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Deutsche Bank AG and its asset manager DWS Group are considering taking a significant minority stake in a Fosun International Ltd.-controlled life insurance consolidator, people familiar with the matter said, potentially marking the German lender’s return to the market. item.title: Deutsche Bank’s DWS Puts CEO Veto on Hiring in Cost Drive
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- DWS Group Chief Executive Officer Stefan Hoops has taken a page out of his mentor’s cost-cutting playbook: hiring decisions at Deutsche Bank AG’s asset management unit now need his signature. Hoops earlier this month also asked managers to prioritize internal replacements over extern...

item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Deutsche Bank AG closed out a record year for profit with higher trading income and a new share buyback, a boost to Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing a day after a raid of its Frankfurt offices raked up memories of the lender’s past troubles. item.title: Auf die Schnelle: Blackstone steigert ausschüttungsfähige Erträge

item.description: +++Die ausschüttungsfähigen Erträge von Blackstone sind im vierten Quartal gestiegen. Der Vermögensverwalter verzeichnete dabei die höchsten Mittelzuflüsse seit mehr als drei Jahren.
